molgenis.name: org.molgenis.patho
molgenis.label: Genome NL Variant Catalogue
molgenis.description:
This database firstly allows efficient storage of variants reported in individuals and/or cohorts. (TODO pathogenecity).
list of genome builds + ref to file E.g. 'hg19'.
list of chromosomes. E.g. 'chr1'.
list of variants incl xref(build), xref(chr), start, end, hgvs notation (e.g. 'G>T'), rsNumber,type(=snp).
list of panels, incl. name and type. E.g. 'gonl (type=cohort)' or 'fam1(type=family)'.
list of individuals. E.g. A102, optionally having father/mother/family relationships. Family is a panel?
optionally, individual genotypes (variant - value(type=) - individual). E.g. 1/1 (numbers indicate variant, 0 means reference)
allele counts (variant - value (type=AC) - cohort)
Aspects: * we want to record who submitted a set of values * we want to record the protocol of data production (== set??) * we want to report families. That is a type of panel?? User interfaces: * search by
